events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it doesn't fit me, and I would like to request a refund.
The customer's request has been categorized under the Refund cluster due to keywords mentioning refund and return.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for the jacket order.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your refund. I'd be happy to assist you with the return process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is in its original condition with tags attached?
My order number is 987654321, and yes, the jacket is still new with all tags attached and hasn't been worn.
Thank you for the details. We will provide you with a prepaid shipping label to return the jacket, and once received, a full refund will be issued.
That sounds great. I appreciate the quick help and look forward to receiving the label so I can send the jacket back.
The shipping label has been sent to your email. Please use it to return the jacket, and your refund will be processed promptly once received.
Just following up to confirm you received the prepaid shipping label and if you need any further assistance with the return.
Yes, I received the label and have already sent the jacket back. Thanks for your help throughout the process.
We have processed your refund, and the amount should appear on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Your refund case has been closed. Please contact us if you need any further assistance in the future.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to your email to gather feedback about your refund experience with our support team.
